title: Which is statistical approach forming conclusions

content.question: Dr. Nash is conducting research on the presence of an authority figure on obedience. She calculates the effect size for her data to show how strong the relationship is between her variables. Which of the following describes this kind of statistical calculation that is concerned with forming conclusions about the effect of the independent variable on variations in the dependent variable?

skill.text: 3.C: Interpret quantitative or qualitative inferential data from a given table, graph, chart, figure, or diagram.
